abstract: Seeking to satisfy European antitrust officials, Microsoft said it would open up and share many more of its technical secrets with the rest of the software industry and competitors.
snippet: Seeking to satisfy European antitrust officials, Microsoft said it would open up and share many more of its technical secrets with the rest of the software industry and competitors.
lead_paragraph: Seeking to satisfy European antitrust officials, Microsoft said Thursday that it would open up and share many more of its technical secrets with the rest of the software industry and competitors.

headline.main: Microsoft to Share More Technical Secrets
